full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHING MCHOG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYE BA'I SMON LAM NOR BU'I THEM SKAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYE BA'I SMON LAM 'DI NI, BRTZON BLO LDAN DKON MCHOG THABS MKHAS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES BSKAL MNYAM RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I SLAD DU GO BDE BAR 'BUL RNAMS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE BO RNAMS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LDAN LUGS BZANG RGYAS PA'I SMON LAM BZHUGS SO, ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
